headline: Tenneco Announces Completion of Strategic Investment to Accelerate Growth
summary: NORTHVILLE, Mich., April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Tenneco LLC (“Tenneco”) today completed the previously announced strategic investment into its Clean Air and Powertrain businesses from Apollo Fund X, with American Industrial Partners (AIP) investing alongside. headline: Layoffs Coming for Trucking, Retail Ahead of Projected Recession, Report Says
summary: Apollo Global Management's chief economist projects that, in late May or early June, trucking and retail will see layoffs ahead of a recession.

headline: Apollo to Present at the 2025 Barclays Americas Select Franchise Conference
summary: NEW YORK, April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that Martin Kelly, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays Americas Select Franchise Conference on Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 8:30 am EDT. A live webcast of the event will be available on Apollo’s Investor Relations website at ir.apollo.com. For those unable to join live, a replay will be available shortly after the event.
